hero.title: VoicetextAI
hero.subtitle: Fast, accurate voice-to-text powered by Deepgram Nova-3.

features.title: Real-time transcription
features.description: Live partial and final results while you speak.

features.title: 40+ languages
features.description: Transcribe speech in over 40 languages with high accuracy.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Full source code on GitHub. Transparent and community-driven.

providers.name: Best-in-class accuracy
providers.description: 54% fewer errors than competitors. Hears exactly what you say, even in noisy environments.

providers.name: Real-time in 40+ languages
providers.description: Speak in any language — transcription appears instantly as you talk.

providers.name: Adapts to your vocabulary
providers.description: Technical terms, names, jargon — it learns your words without any setup.

providers.name: Works with any audio
providers.description: Background noise, accents, low-quality mics — Nova-3 handles it all.

providers.name: Preferred 8-to-1 over Whisper
providers.description: In blind tests across 7 languages, users overwhelmingly chose Nova-3.

openSource.title: Open source
bullets: 100% open source — read every line of code on GitHub
Built in public — every bug fix and feature tracked openly
No telemetry, no lock-in — your voice data stays yours
openSource.note: Transparency and trust through open code.

faq.question: How does transcription work?
faq.answer: Press the hotkey, speak — text appears instantly and is copied to your clipboard.

faq.question: Is it free?
faq.answer: Yes. The free plan has no time limit. Paid plans unlock more minutes and priority support.

faq.question: Is my voice data private?
faq.answer: Your audio is processed in real time and not stored. No recordings are saved.

faq.question: How do I change the hotkey?
Is the project open source?
faq.answer: Yes, full source code on GitHub.

download.title: Download
download.note: Choose your platform and install in minutes.

testimonials.name: Alex M.
testimonials.text: Replaced my expensive transcription tool. Works faster and it's free.

testimonials.name: Sarah K.
testimonials.text: I dictate blog posts while walking. The accuracy is impressive.

testimonials.name: Marco R.
testimonials.text: I reply to Slack messages by voice now. Way faster than typing during meetings.

testimonials.name: Yuki T.
testimonials.text: Finally a voice-to-text that works on Linux. Simple and reliable.

testimonials.name: Lisa W.
testimonials.text: The real-time transcription is incredibly fast. No lag at all.

testimonials.name: Dan P.
testimonials.text: Dictating emails and notes instead of typing. Saves me at least an hour every day.

pricing.name: Free
pricing.description: Try VoicetextAI with a generous free tier.

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.description: More minutes and priority support for power users.

pricing.name: Team
pricing.description: For teams that need shared billing and admin controls.
